Reviews.Title: Love this laptop -- great deal and great for Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Christensen
Reviews.Content: I love this computer. Anyone familiar with Windows 8 understands the importance of a touchscreen. For the price, this computer is a great deal. Don't be swayed by the lack of reviews, similar models with slightly different model numbers are very highly rated. I like the chicklet keyboard. My only slight very minor complaint is no hardware volume control. I have recommended this laptop to 5 people so far and they are also very happy with it. Let me tell you this too -- Amazon amazed me with the turn-around time. Ordered it Wednesday at 3PM and I had it Thursday at 4 PM! Amazon Prime and UPS have their act together, that's for sure!! Overall, this is a great deal on a great laptop.

Reviews.Title: Love this computer!!
Reviews.Author: tlb
Reviews.Content: I purchased this computer during Black Friday week on Amazon for a really great price.  I have owned Dell computers in the past and the majority of computers at work are also Dell so this was a no brainer purchase for me.  The computer feels solid and the processor is fast.  Wireless set up was easy, registering the computer was easy and updating to Windows 8.1 was easy.  I have transferred hundreds of pictures and financial spreadsheets from my old computer and there were no compatibility issues.  The touchscreen works great and the display is better than I expected.  I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this again and would definitely recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Very good computer for its price
Reviews.Author: zhonghua zhang
Reviews.Content: I ordered this computer for my 12 year old daughter. It ended up me using it most of time. We all love it. We have 2 other laptops (Toshiba and Acer) at home which were purchased with similar prices. This new Dell laptop is the best in term of speed and easy of use. Touch screen is definitely a plus!

Reviews.Title: Great for thé price
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Ramirez
Reviews.Content: Very Happy with thé performance with it being so cheap. Great as a day to day laptop. Recommend to anybody!

Reviews.Title: I'm very happy with this computer
Reviews.Author: Tequila Mockingbird
Reviews.Content: Love the computer, hate Windows 8.1. I miss XP so much. It was simple; Windows 8.1 (which I downloaded first thing based on other reviewers' suggestions) is complicated and I just plain hate it. The computer itself is a dream. Low price, long battery life, lightweight, sturdy, and it's a Dell, which speaks for itself. This computer is very fast for loading files and lightweight gaming - I don't know about more complicated games. Colors are brilliant. Photos are sharp and clear. I love having the card reader right on the front and it reads the card from my camera perfectly. As I don't have cable or satellite at the moment, watching tv programs and movies online with this computer is extremely satisfying (thank you, networks, for letting us watch episodes online). They stream fast (on my old computer the sound and picture lagged and were never in sync). I especially love having the HDMI connector on this computer, as I can now hook it to my HD tv and watch all programs on the big screen. If you haven't bought your HDMI cable yet, I advise you to buy a long one. Mine is short and I have to leave the computer on the coffee table. I would prefer having it on the sofa with me. Watching them on the computer is equally satisfying, just smaller. The touchscreen......well, I can't say I really love it but as most people do, I guess I'm in the minority on that subject. I hate that the menu bar pops up all the time on the right side when I'm just trying to move the cursor. I hate that the screen image magnifies when all I'm trying to do is swipe upward to scroll further along in the text. I am learning more every day and will get used to the touchscreen, but I find I'm using the touchpad to move the cursor for the most part. It is reliable and unwanted items aren't popping up onscreen all the time. I highly recommend this computer for its price, size, and performance.

Reviews.Title: good computer for 11 year old
Reviews.Author: Tara "I like quality"
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 + touchscreen is pretty cool. We went to stores and looked at much much higher priced laptops which had more gadgets (turned into a tablet, folded in half, etc.) but seemed crazy for a school aged child. We are happy with the purchase so far. I might update my review in 6 months or so once we've formed more of an opinion about performance.

Reviews.Title: Lemon City
Reviews.Author: kd
Reviews.Content: Laptop was defective, upon arrival. After hours on the phone w/ Tech Support, it was determined hardware was the problem. Had to wait for a tech to come to my house, and he changed the entire screen. So now I have a "refurbished" Dell, and had the pleasure of buying it as new.  Dell needs to work on Quality Control, I am disappointed after this experience.

Reviews.Title: Got This For Christmas
Reviews.Author: Spencer
Reviews.Content: The laptop is really excellent for the price.  It is built very well, the screen is nice, and it just works great.  I saw someone complain about the plastic being thin and bad, no this plastic feels very thick and durable to me.  It just definitely worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Love this new Dell product and we are very Happy with it
Reviews.Author: Al D
Reviews.Content: This laptop has met and exceeded our expectations! Fits all of  my wife's needs for her school work! Very Happy

Reviews.Title: It's not better but.... just as good as sliced bread
Reviews.Author: Ray A. Radvillaws
Reviews.Content: Good enough ...a good $$ value...excellent keyboard ...the touch screen works fine but the mouse or keyboard is more convenient for me ....after all its only a laptop ...OH ya ...windows 8 oh well ...welcome to another learning curve couple of weeks

Reviews.Title: Another Dell Homerun
Reviews.Author: Ronald J. Conger "gasparky"
Reviews.Content: My old Dell desktop has reached close to it's end and I needed a replacement. This laptop has met my expectations and for the product name, Dell is still up there in my book. Ordering through Amazon.com was my best choice as I received it in two days and the non descriptive packaging was such that UPS was able to leave it on my porch without anyone having to be home to sign for it. I had originally tried to order this through the military's exchange site but Dell's connection through the exchange fell through and it was going to be nearly a month before I could get the laptop. Thanks as usual Amazon for fast efficient service. The touchscreen is a new media for me so I find I'm having fun working between a normal touchpad, a mouse and then the touchscreen. Learning curves can be a bit bewildering (Windows 8.1 helps) but all total, I made the right choice and have already recommended this laptop to two of my friends.

Reviews.Title: Best computer I've ever had!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's fast, it's light, it's secure. I really like this computer. This is my first computer with Windows 8 and so far I am loving that. The touch screen is really good as well. I would fully recommend getting this computer.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Brittany Jo Cull
Reviews.Content: I absolutely am 100% satisfied with this laptop :) ! Its just what I was looking for!! I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a laptop!

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron
Reviews.Author: Michael O.
Reviews.Content: I love the computer but there are times when it does not come right on and I have to play around with it.  I like the touchscreen on it.

Reviews.Title: had trouble getting set up with 8.1
Reviews.Author: oascout
Reviews.Content: I could not get a down load from on line for 8.1 even when it was advertised free. I finally called Dell and they were able to help with the down load. I also found that the company that sold this computer to me thru Amazon could have gotten it from Walmart. this was confirmed by Dell that it was provided to Walmart from them (DELL) The box that it arrived in had 2 more box's inside one had a lable from Walmart to the company that sold it to me.

Reviews.Title: Love my laptop
Reviews.Author: evaniejane
Reviews.Content: This was my very first laptop, which I got last Christmas.  I've been a desktop computer person all my life, since before laptops were invented, let alone this new fangled touch screen business.  :)I like Dell in general for their decent machines and good customer service.  This laptop is nice, has a number keypad (not all laptops do), touch screen, windows 8, textured body exterior, nice weight, good sized touch pad with click-type buttons, keyboard has a nice typing feel to it, decent battery life, good speed of operation, etc.I am really happy with this mid-range laptop.  I didn't need anything super duper fancy, since I'm not a gamer and I still have my desktop computer for the more heavy lifting (photo editing, CAD drawing, etc.)Would recommend. :)

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Shipped fast, looks and works great!!!!!My kids love it. Its really easy to use and they love the touch screen and apps.

Reviews.Title: crazy Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Judy Brock
Reviews.Content: I am going crazy with Windows 8.  That has got to be the most Un-intuitive (is there such a word) operating system I have used to date.  The touchscreen was probably not a good choice for me.  Things dance around, disappear, go ballistic.  I guess I will have to use the tutorials that are coming via email for this one.

Reviews.Title: Dell's are the best
Reviews.Author: Dawn Kidd "kid reader"
Reviews.Content: I have always bought a Dell, except last time.  I went to another brand and didn't like it.  So this time I went back to a Dell and I love it.  I like that it has a touch screen and a key board and Windows 8.  Also the price was very good  at Amazon.  Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: 'first laptop.
Reviews.Author: R. Casadonte
Reviews.Content: It does what I wanted it for.  Being able to get online while away from home base. My daughter liked it as well, except for the permanent dot in the middle of my screen.

Reviews.Title: I use the laptop for college
Reviews.Author: Harold H Roach
Reviews.Content: The laptop is great. Windows 8.0 is not great. The upgrade to Windows 8.1 was a nightmare as I had to get help from both Microsoft and Dell. I had a hard time understanding the accents of the support staff from both organizations. I am 81 and hard of hearing. I use the laptop for the classes I take from the local community college. I also use an older desktop at home.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 15 i15RVT-3762BLK 15.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop (Black)
Reviews.Author: Roberta Halle
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my college student whose computer crashed during finals week. She absolutely is thrilled with everything about this new Dell touchscreen laptop.

Reviews.Title: Had to return for refund
Reviews.Author: John Sharkey
Reviews.Content: Whenever you opened or shut the screen the display would flicker multi colors. It appeared to have a short between the screen and mitherboard

Reviews.Title: Worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Christina Stiles
Reviews.Content: This laptop very much met my expectations. It's exactly what I needed, and I highly recommend it. I LOVE it!

Reviews.Title: Beware the basic warranty
Reviews.Author: Neil A. King
Reviews.Content: The laptop is good. Be aware that the warranty is a very basic one that is not transferrable outside the US, even though the Dell tech support originally said that it was.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Dosio-Tarkos
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed in this laptop and  it stopped working on Jan 8, 2014. I would like to return it and I'm hoping Amazon lets me.an

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron RVT-3762
Reviews.Author: Lou Califf
Reviews.Content: I don't know whether the computer is good or bad.  I was sent  a Dell Inspiron 17RV-3721 instead of what I ordered.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good- EDITED! BEWARE!
Reviews.Author: S. Grider
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box you can tell that this laptop needs a memory boost. The memory that comes with it is not enough. It looks ok, the plastic feels cheap, like I could break it in two. I think that cheaper feeling plastic is the key to the light weight of the laptop though. All in all, it works, it is responsive when I haven't bogged it down, and the speakers work quite well.EDIT! DO NOT BUY THIS POS. I just got this laptop today and I've found a USB port that won't accept a cable, the laptop won't shutdown properly, the Dell software fights the Windows software, and it won't update to Windows 8.1. Beware! This is going back!On a good note, the battery has lasted for three hours with me fighting this crap box.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Pentium 2127U Processor (2M Cache, 1.9GHz)
4 GB DDR3
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Touchscreen Display
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 15 i15RVT-3762BLK 15.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop (Black)
